title: Unauthorized qms-cli Modification During Container Testing

comment: PRE-REVIEW VERIFICATION COMPLETE. Frontmatter verified: title='Unauthorized qms-cli Modification During Container Testing', revision_summary='Initial draft'. All required VAR sections present per SOP-004 Section 9A.3. Pre-approved content (Sections 1-6) is complete. Variance Identification correctly identifies parent (CR-043), failed items (EI-6/EI-7), and Type (2). Root cause analysis identifies three contributing factors. Proposed resolution to create INV is appropriate. Type 2 classification is justified - CR-043 objectives met, investigation work should not block closure. Executable block appropriately contains template placeholders for execution phase. No deficiencies in pre-approved content. Recommend approval.

POST-REVIEW VERIFICATION COMPLETE. Frontmatter verified: title='Unauthorized qms-cli Modification During Container Testing', revision_summary='Initial draft'. All required VAR sections present per SOP-004 Section 9A.3. Execution block verified: VAR-EI-1 has Pass outcome with evidence referencing INV-008 creation. Evidence confirmed: INV-008 is PRE_APPROVED at v1.0, satisfying Type 2 VAR block release criteria per SOP-004 Section 9A.2. Scope handoff explicitly documented in Resolution Comments confirming no scope items lost. No placeholder content (TBD/TODO/FIXME/XXX) found. Formatting consistent throughout. All post-review requirements per SOP-004 Section 10 satisfied. Recommend approval.
